titleInfo.title: AMERICAN SECURITY AGAINST FOREIGN ENEMIES ACT OF 2015--MOTION TO PROCEED

extension.searchTitle: AMERICAN SECURITY AGAINST FOREIGN ENEMIES ACT OF 2015--MOTION TO PROCEED; Congressional Record Vol. 162, No. 11

congVote.result: Three-fifths of the Senators duly chosen and sworn not having voted in the affirmative, the motion is rejected.
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: Senate resumed consideration of the motion to proceed to consideration of H.R. 4038, to require that supplemental certifications and background investigations be completed prior to the admission of certain aliens as refugees.<P/>During consideration of this measure today, Senate also took the following action:<P/>By 55 yeas to 43 nays (Vote No. 4), three-fifths of those Senators duly chosen and sworn, not having voted in the affirmative, Senate rejected the motion to close further debate on the motion to proceed to consideration of the bill.
